thread.title: Kids Say They Like Their Pets More Than They Like Their Siblings
thread.title_full: Kids Say They Like Their Pets More Than They Like Their Siblings

author: Melissa Dahl
title: Kids Say They Like Their Pets More Than They Like Their Siblings
text: Fact one: Everyone secretly has a favorite family member. Fact two: People are increasingly likely to say they consider their pets to be family members . And fact three: It is likely that everyone’s favorite family member is secretly the dog. For an odd little study published ... More »
